title: Noein: Mou Hitori no Kimi e (Noein: to your other self)
synopsis: During their last summer of elementary school, four friends decide to undertake a test of courage at their local graveyard. Before the test begins, Haruka Kaminogi makes a last effort to pull Yuu Gotou away from his controlling mother. While doing so, Haruka suddenly has a strange vision of blue snow followed by the appearance of an imposing silver-haired man. Later, a similar vision occurs at the graveyard to both Haruka and her friends before they try to escape what they assume are ghosts.
voices: ['Nakai, Kazuya', 'Kudou, Haruka', 'Takimoto, Fujiko', 'Nakai, Kazuya', 'Suzumura, Kenichi', 'Shiraishi, Ryouko', 'Miyata, Kouki', 'Kiyasu, Kohei', 'Chiba, Saeko', 'Nazuka, Kaori']
